Title: S7:E8 - How do you build a great product? (Ryan Hoover)
Description: Ryan took his love of products and created Product Hunt, a place to share and discover new products, which sold to Angel List for a rumored $20M. Ryan shares what makes a great product, what he looks for in products as an investor, and how you can get started in product management. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie! (sponsor)  Dreamweaver Product Hunt Codeland 2019
